data.text:
The following is the list of video games published by Sony Interactive Entertainment that have sold the highest number of software units worldwide. Several titles released by Sony have achieved significant commercial success, with titles such as The Last of Us, Uncharted 4: A Thief's End, God of War, Spider-Man and Horizon Zero Dawn reported or estimated to have sold over 20 million copies.
